department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
duration_in_months: When expected contract to end date subtract contract start date, expressed in months
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### EP076-232042 | ESDC Office Seating

 governo Sudication Solicitation (SPS) details are as follows:

* Reference number: WS4013754774
* Solicitation number: WS4013754774
* Publication date: May 25, 2023
* Tender closing date: June 14, 2023
* Amendment date: June 8, 2023
* Expected contract start date: July 10, 2023
* Expected contract end date: February 20, 2024

#### Contract Details
The Canadian government invites bids for the procurement of office seating for the Établissement de services décisionnels du Canada (ESDC). 
The contract is categorized as Goods and Services (GD).

#### Solicitation Method
This tender is conducted through an open bidding process, adhering to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Solicitation Criteria
The solicitation will be awarded based on the lowest price.

#### Regions of Operation and Deliveries
The successful bidder will be required to deliver the goods within the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contact Information
For any inquires, please contact:
Husain Al-Amidi (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [husain.al-amidi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:husain.al-amidi@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL and Attachment
Please visit the following link to access the full tender notice: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16392588?extsite=MTYzOTI1ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16392588?extsite=MTYzOTI1ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
